org.springframework.boot.legacy.context.web

Class SpringBootContextLoaderListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.web.context.ContextLoader
      • org.springframework.web.context.ContextLoaderListener
        • org.springframework.boot.legacy.context.web.SpringBootContextLoaderListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, javax.servlet.ServletContextListener

    public class SpringBootContextLoaderListener
extends org.springframework.web.context.ContextLoaderListener
    A ContextLoaderListener that uses SpringApplication to initialize an application context. Allows Servlet 2.5 applications (with web.xml) to take advantage of all the initialization extras in Spring Boot even if they don't use an embedded container.
    Author:
    Dave Syer
